_source.productDescription:
The Shaw and Partners Coolangatta Gold has historically been one of the most challenging endurance races in surf sports.

Competitors will face three brand-new race formats, each designed for exciting racing that will test the limits of their endurance.

Don't miss the fittest athletes in the country taking on their Shaw and Partners Coolangatta Gold challenge this October on the Gold Coast.
_source.productShortDescription: The Shaw and Partners Coolangatta Gold has historically been one of the most challenging endurance races in surf sports.

_source.productDescription:
The purpose of the Notta Grand Prix is to have family fun on wheels in a safer environment than the road. 

It has been designed to a price-point where it is easily affordable. Notta Grand Prix is available to all members of the public from the age of 12. Road registered cars can be used and are welcome. Come on, you can get your wife & kids involved and help them develop the right attitude to recreational motoring in this 
family oriented event.

The challenge for each team is to get as far as they can, as soon as they can; for as little as they can, all against a minimum lap time of 72 seconds. Big powerful cars will need more pit stops which, at 7 minutes each, will almost certainly mean the well driven economical cars will have a definite advantage.
_source.productShortDescription: The purpose of the Notta Grand Prix is to have family fun on wheels in a safer environment than the road.

The Entry Fee is $990 per Vehicle for each event and a Team will consist of between strictly four and six drivers per Vehicle. Teams are required to field at least four drivers for each event.  Each Team is to have a nominated TEAM LEADER.

SPECTATORS FREE

Tujuan dari Notta Grand Prix adalah untuk bersenang-senang bersama keluarga di atas roda dalam lingkungan yang lebih aman daripada di jalan raya.

Acara ini dirancang dengan harga yang terjangkau. Notta Grand Prix tersedia untuk semua anggota masyarakat mulai usia 12 tahun. Mobil yang terdaftar di jalan raya dapat digunakan dan dipersilakan. Ayo, ajak istri & anak-anak Anda untuk terlibat dan bantu mereka mengembangkan sikap yang tepat terhadap berkendara rekreasi dalam
acara berorientasi keluarga ini.

Tantangan bagi setiap tim adalah untuk melaju sejauh mungkin, secepat mungkin; dengan waktu sesingkat mungkin, dengan catatan waktu putaran minimal 72 detik. Mobil-mobil besar dan bertenaga akan membutuhkan lebih banyak pit stop yang, dengan durasi masing-masing 7 menit, hampir pasti berarti mobil-mobil irit yang dikendarai dengan baik akan memiliki keunggulan yang pasti.

_source.productName: Free Baby Massage Demonstration for Parents
_source.productDescription:
The Infant Massage Information Service will be holding free demonstration sessions on infant massage for parents throughout Australia in 2025. 

The sessions will cover a massage demonstration as well as discussions on appropriate oils to use for massage time, when and how long to massage for, and the benefits of massage for infants.

Baby massage can decrease crying and improve sleep. U.S research has also shown that massage strengthens the immune system in addition to providing a wide range of additional physical and psychological benefits.

Infants are invited to attend the session with their parent/s and expected parents are also welcome to join in.

Limited spaces are available, and parents must reserve a position to attend. 

To book, contact the Infant Massage Information Service via phone or email.

Layanan Informasi Pijat Bayi akan mengadakan sesi demonstrasi pijat bayi gratis untuk orang tua di seluruh Australia pada tahun 2025.

Sesi ini akan mencakup demonstrasi pijat serta diskusi tentang minyak yang tepat untuk digunakan selama waktu pijat, kapan dan berapa lama pijat, serta manfaat pijat untuk bayi.

Pijat bayi dapat mengurangi tangisan dan meningkatkan kualitas tidur. Penelitian di AS juga menunjukkan bahwa pijat memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh selain memberikan berbagai manfaat fisik dan psikologis tambahan.

Bayi diundang untuk menghadiri sesi bersama orang tua mereka, dan calon orang tua juga dipersilakan untuk bergabung.

Tempat terbatas, dan orang tua harus memesan tempat untuk hadir.

Untuk memesan, hubungi Layanan Informasi Pijat Bayi melalui telepon atau email.

Nel 2025, l'Infant Massage Information Service terrÃ  sessioni dimostrative gratuite sul massaggio infantile per i genitori in tutta l'Australia.

Le sessioni comprenderanno una dimostrazione di massaggio e discussioni sugli oli appropriati da utilizzare durante il massaggio, su quando e per quanto tempo massaggiare e sui benefici del massaggio per i neonati.

Il massaggio infantile puÃ² ridurre il pianto e migliorare il sonno. Ricerche statunitensi hanno inoltre dimostrato che il massaggio rafforza il sistema immunitario, oltre a fornire una vasta gamma di ulteriori benefici fisici e psicologici.

I neonati sono invitati a partecipare alla sessione con i genitori e anche i futuri genitori sono benvenuti.

I posti disponibili sono limitati e i genitori devono prenotare un posto per partecipare.

Per prenotare, contattare l'Infant Massage Information Service telefonicamente o via email.

_source.productDescription:
After a meteoric rise to global stardom and due to overwhelming demand, GRAMMY-nominated multi-Platinum artist Teddy Swims announces his return to Australia and New Zealand this October 2025. Proudly presented by Frontier Touring, the forthcoming tour will see Swims perform in the largest arenas he's ever played in both countries, joined on stage by his electrifying live band, Freak Freely.

Having amassed over 8.7 billion streams globally, Swims has captured the hearts of music fans worldwide with his phenomenal live show and Platinum hits such as 'Lose Control' and  'The Door'. His recent album I've Tried Everything But Therapy (Part 2), released earlier this month via Warner Records, has been met with critical acclaim worldwide, with standout tracks like 'Bad Dreams', Are You Even Real (feat. GivÄ“on)', and 'Guilty' continuing his legacy as one of the most dynamic voices in modern music. Debuting at #1 on the album charts in Australia #2 in the UK #4 in the USA and New Zealand, Swims' latest 13-track offering also smashed the Top 10 in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Scotland, Sweden, Switzerland and beyond.
_source.productShortDescription: Platinum artist Teddy Swims announces his return to Australia and New Zealand this October 2025.

Proudly presented by Frontier Touring, the forthcoming tour will see Swims perform in the largest arenas he's ever played in both countries, joined on stage by his electrifying live band, Freak Freely.

Having amassed over 8.7 billion streams globally, Swims has captured the hearts of music fans worldwide with his phenomenal live show and Platinum hits such as 'Lose Control' and  'The Door'. His recent album I've Tried Everything But Therapy (Part 2), released earlier this month via Warner Records, has been met with critical acclaim worldwide, with standout tracks like 'Bad Dreams', Are You Even Real (feat. GivÄ“on)', and 'Guilty' continuing his legacy as one of the most dynamic voices in modern music. Debuting at #1 on the album charts in Australia #2 in the UK #4 in the USA and New Zealand, Swims' latest 13-track offering also smashed the Top 10 in Austria, Belgium, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Scotland, Sweden, Switzerland and beyond.

Setelah meroket menjadi bintang global dan karena permintaan yang sangat besar, artis multi-Platinum yang dinominasikan GRAMMY Teddy Swims mengumumkan kembalinya ke Australia dan Selandia Baru pada bulan Oktober 2025 ini. Dipersembahkan dengan bangga oleh Frontier Touring, tur mendatang ini akan memperlihatkan Swims tampil di arena terbesar yang pernah ia mainkan di kedua negara, bergabung di atas panggung dengan band live-nya yang memukau, Freak Freely.

Setelah mengumpulkan lebih dari 8,7 miliar streaming secara global, Swims telah merebut hati penggemar musik di seluruh dunia dengan pertunjukan langsungnya yang fenomenal dan hit Platinum seperti 'Lose Control' dan 'The Door'. Album terbarunya I've Tried Everything But Therapy (Part 2), dirilis awal bulan ini melalui Warner Records, telah mendapat pujian kritis di seluruh dunia, dengan lagu-lagu menonjol seperti 'Bad Dreams', Are You Even Real (feat. GivÄ“on)', dan 'Guilty' melanjutkan warisannya sebagai salah satu suara paling dinamis dalam musik modern. Memulai debutnya di posisi #1 di tangga album di Australia #2 di Inggris #4 di Amerika Serikat dan Selandia Baru, album terbaru Swims yang berisi 13 lagu juga berhasil menembus Top 10 di Austria, Belgia, Jerman, Hungaria, Irlandia, Belanda, Norwegia, Skotlandia, Swedia, Swiss, dan negara-negara lainnya.

_source.productName: Festival of Small Halls Announces Spring Tour 2025: Cameby
_source.productDescription:
Festival of Small Halls has announced that Joe H Henry and Georgia Mooney will feature on their upcoming Spring Tour 2025: Outback Queensland to New South Wales.  

Presented by veteran festival producers Woodfordia Inc, the 47th edition of the much-loved not-for-profit music tour is embarking on a packed schedule to fifteen community halls. 

These stalwart vessels of community life have been drawn from across the rich and diverse landscapes of Queensland and New South Wales. Halls of all shapes and sizes will throw open their doors, from the quaint hinterlands of the Sunshine Coast to outback locations like Eulo, Blackall and Cameby down into the Granite Belt and finishing up along the coast of Northern New South Wales.
_source.productShortDescription: Festival of Small Halls has announced that Joe H Henry and Georgia Mooney will feature on their upcoming Spring Tour 2025.

Festival of Small Halls telah mengumumkan bahwa Joe H Henry dan Georgia Mooney akan tampil dalam Tur Musim Semi 2025 mendatang: Queensland Outback ke New South Wales.

Dipersembahkan oleh produser festival veteran Woodfordia Inc, edisi ke-47 dari tur musik nirlaba yang sangat digemari ini akan memulai jadwal padat ke lima belas balai komunitas.

Wadah-wadah kehidupan komunitas yang tangguh ini telah didatangkan dari seluruh lanskap Queensland dan New South Wales yang kaya dan beragam. Balai-balai komunitas dengan berbagai bentuk dan ukuran akan membuka pintu mereka, dari pedalaman Sunshine Coast yang asri hingga lokasi-lokasi pedalaman seperti Eulo, Blackall, dan Cameby hingga ke Granite Belt dan berakhir di sepanjang pesisir New South Wales Utara.

_source.productDescription:
The Blackall 100 is a trail ultra-marathon that traverses the beautiful and scenic Great Walk of the Sunshine Coast. The event is open to runners and walkers with distances of 100 kilometres and 50 kilometres. With a generous cut-off of 24 hours, this event could be within anyone's reach. 

Hosted at the QCCC Mapleton, there are event packages available, or you may choose to stay in one of the many beautiful bed and breakfasts in the surrounding towns on the Sunshine Coast Hinterland.
_source.productShortDescription: The Blackall 100 is a trail ultra-marathon that traverses the beautiful and scenic Great Walk of the Sunshine Coast.

_source.productDescription:
Yeehaw! Them Hillbilly Goats are hitchin' up the wagon and rollin' into town â€“ and they're bringin' a boot-stompin', washboard-slappin', banjo-blazin' hoedown that'll blow the roof clean off the barn! They're hitting Banshees Bar andÂ Artspace for an afternoon like no other!

These here Goats ain't no backyard pickers â€“ they're the 2022 Folk Band of the Year, 2020 Golden Fiddle winners, and multi-time Golden Guitar finalists. They've been tearin' up festival stages and packin' out venues all over this wide brown land for more than a decade, and they ain't slowin' down!

With double bass, fiddle, banjo, harmonica, tap shoes and a whole lotta heart, they bring the spirit of the Appalachian mountains straight to yer doorstep. Expect tales of moonshine, mischief, and mountain mayhem â€“ all wrapped up in harmonies sweeter than grandma's peach cobbler and rhythms that'll make yer boots dance on their own.

The Goats don't just play music â€“ they throw a dang hillbilly party! So grab yer hat, wrangle up the young'uns, and git ready to get goatified!
You ain't seen nothin' like The Hillbilly Goats â€“ it's time to get swept up in the stomp!

Yeehaw! Kambing-kambing Hillbilly itu naik kereta dan meluncur ke kota â€“ dan mereka membawakan musik hoedown yang menghentakkan sepatu bot, menampar papan cuci, dan memercikkan banjo yang akan meledakkan atap gudang! Mereka akan mengunjungi Banshees Bar dan Artspace untuk sore yang tak ada duanya!

Kambing-kambing ini bukan pemetik halaman belakang â€“ mereka adalah Folk Band of the Year 2022, pemenang Golden Fiddle 2020, dan finalis Golden Guitar beberapa kali. Mereka telah mengguncang panggung festival dan memenuhi tempat-tempat di seluruh negeri cokelat yang luas ini selama lebih dari satu dekade, dan mereka tidak melambat!

Dengan double bass, biola, banjo, harmonika, sepatu tap, dan banyak hati, mereka membawa semangat pegunungan Appalachian langsung ke depan pintu Anda. Nantikan kisah-kisah tentang minuman keras ilegal, kenakalan, dan kekacauan gunung â€“ semuanya terbungkus dalam harmoni yang lebih manis daripada kue persik nenek dan ritme yang akan membuat sepatu bot Anda menari sendiri.

The Goats tidak hanya bermain musik â€“ mereka mengadakan pesta hillbilly yang asyik! Jadi, ambil topi Anda, kumpulkan anak-anak muda, dan bersiaplah untuk menjadi kambing!
Anda belum pernah melihat yang seperti The Hillbilly Goats â€“ saatnya untuk terhanyut dalam hentakan kaki!

Yeehaw! Quei Hillbilly Goats stanno attaccando il carro e stanno arrivando in cittÃ , e stanno portando un hoedown a suon di stivali, tavole da lavare e banjo che farÃ  saltare il tetto della stalla! Stanno andando al Banshees Bar and Artspace per un pomeriggio come nessun altro!

Questi Goats non sono dei raccoglitori di frutta da cortile: sono la Folk Band dell'Anno 2022, vincitori del Golden Fiddle 2020 e piÃ¹ volte finalisti del Golden Guitar. Hanno fatto saltare i palchi dei festival e riempito i locali di questa vasta terra bruna per piÃ¹ di un decennio, e non hanno intenzione di rallentare!

Con contrabbasso, violino, banjo, armonica, tip tap e un sacco di cuore, portano lo spirito dei monti Appalachi direttamente a casa tua. Aspettatevi storie di chiaro di luna, dispetti e caos montano, il tutto avvolto da armonie piÃ¹ dolci della crostata di pesche della nonna e ritmi che vi faranno ballare da soli.

I Goats non si limitano a suonare: organizzano una festa campagnola! Quindi prendete il cappello, radunatevi con i ragazzi e preparatevi a farvi trasformare in caproni!
Non avete mai visto niente di simile ai Goats Hillbilly: Ã¨ ora di lasciarsi travolgere dalla festa!

Juhu! Die Hillbilly Goats spannen den Wagen an und rollen in die Stadt â€“ und sie bringen eine stiefelstampfende, waschbrettklatschende, banjoblierende Party mit, die das Dach der Scheune wegfegen wird! Sie schlagen in der Banshees Bar und im Artspace auf und verbringen einen Nachmittag wie keinen anderen!

Diese Goats hier sind keine Hinterhof-Picker â€“ sie sind die Folk-Band des Jahres 2022, Gewinner der Goldenen Geige 2020 und mehrfache Finalisten der Goldenen Gitarre. Seit Ã¼ber einem Jahrzehnt rocken sie FestivalbÃ¼hnen und fÃ¼llen Veranstaltungsorte in diesem weiten, braunen Land, und sie machen nicht langsamer!

Mit Kontrabass, Geige, Banjo, Mundharmonika, Steppschuhen und ganz viel Herz bringen sie den Geist der Appalachen direkt vor Ihre HaustÃ¼r. Freut euch auf Geschichten von Schwarzgebranntem, Unfug und Bergchaos â€“ alles verpackt in Harmonien, die sÃ¼ÃŸer sind als Omas Pfirsichkuchen, und Rhythmen, die eure Stiefel zum Tanzen bringen.

Die Goats spielen nicht nur Musik â€“ sie schmeiÃŸen eine verdammte Hillbilly-Party! Also schnappt euch euren Hut, trommelt die Kleinen zusammen und macht euch bereit fÃ¼r die Goatifizierung!
So etwas wie die Hillbilly Goats habt ihr noch nie gesehen â€“ es ist Zeit, euch vom Stampfen mitreiÃŸen zu lassen!

_source.productDescription:
Join academics Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey, and Kath Horton at the IMA for a panel discussion exploring the complex cultural legacy of the corset.

The panel will examine how this historic foundation garment continues to shape contemporary expectations of the feminine, particularly through the rise of activewear and shapewear industries. Tracing the corset's evolution from utilitarian undergarment to high fashion statement, from 1980s punk reclamation by designers like Vivienne Westwood and Jean Paul Gaultier, to today's cottagecore aesthetics and 'Glassons corset' fast fashion iterations.

The conversation will address debate surrounding the corset's meaningâ€”whether it represents patriarchal oppression or, as some contemporary artists like Michaela Stark argue, serves as empowering armour that allows wearers to sculpt their bodies on their own terms.

Unpacking the corset, the discussion will consider the garment as a powerful metaphor for broader questions about bodily autonomy, the policing of feminine presentation, and ongoing feminist tensions around hyper-feminine expression in popular culture.

productComments.commentText:
Join academics Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey, and Kath Horton at the IMA for a panel discussion exploring the complex cultural legacy of the corset.

The panel will examine how this historic foundation garment continues to shape contemporary expectations of the feminine, particularly through the rise of activewear and shapewear industries. Tracing the corset's evolution from utilitarian undergarment to high fashion statement, from 1980s punk reclamation by designers like Vivienne Westwood and Jean Paul Gaultier, to today's cottagecore aesthetics and 'Glassons corset' fast fashion iterations.

The conversation will address debate surrounding the corset's meaningâ€”whether it represents patriarchal oppression or, as some contemporary artists like Michaela Stark argue, serves as empowering armour that allows wearers to sculpt their bodies on their own terms.

Unpacking the corset, the discussion will consider the garment as a powerful metaphor for broader questions about bodily autonomy, the policing of feminine presentation, and ongoing feminist tensions around hyper-feminine expression in popular culture.

Nehmen Sie an einer Podiumsdiskussion mit den Wissenschaftlerinnen Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey und Kath Horton im IMA teil und erkunden Sie das komplexe kulturelle Erbe des Korsetts.

Junte-se aos acadÃªmicos Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey e Kath Horton no IMA para um painel de discussÃ£o que explora o complexo legado cultural do espartilho.

O painel examinarÃ¡ como esta peÃ§a histÃ³rica fundamental continua a moldar as expectativas contemporÃ¢neas do feminino, particularmente por meio da ascensÃ£o das indÃºstrias de roupas esportivas e modeladoras. TraÃ§ando a evoluÃ§Ã£o do espartilho, de peÃ§a Ã­ntima utilitÃ¡ria a uma declaraÃ§Ã£o de alta costura, desde a retomada do punk dos anos 1980 por designers como Vivienne Westwood e Jean Paul Gaultier, atÃ© a estÃ©tica cottagecore atual e as iteraÃ§Ãµes fast fashion do "espartilho Glassons".

A conversa abordarÃ¡ o debate em torno do significado do espartilho â€” se ele representa a opressÃ£o patriarcal ou, como argumentam alguns artistas contemporÃ¢neos como Michaela Stark, serve como uma armadura empoderadora que permite que as usuÃ¡rias esculpam seus corpos em seus prÃ³prios termos.

Desvendando o espartilho, a discussÃ£o considerarÃ¡ a vestimenta como uma metÃ¡fora poderosa para questÃµes mais amplas sobre autonomia corporal, o policiamento da apresentaÃ§Ã£o feminina e as tensÃµes feministas contÃ­nuas em torno da expressÃ£o hiperfeminina na cultura popular.

Unisciti agli studiosi Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey e Kath Horton all'IMA per una tavola rotonda che esplorerÃ  la complessa ereditÃ  culturale del corsetto.

Il panel esaminerÃ  come questo storico capo di abbigliamento continui a plasmare le aspettative contemporanee del femminile, in particolare attraverso l'ascesa dell'industria dell'activewear e dello shapewear. TraccerÃ  l'evoluzione del corsetto da indumento intimo funzionale a dichiarazione di alta moda, dal recupero del punk degli anni '80 da parte di stilisti come Vivienne Westwood e Jean Paul Gaultier, all'estetica cottagecore odierna e alle iterazioni del fast fashion del "corsetto Glassons".

La conversazione affronterÃ  il dibattito sul significato del corsetto: se rappresenti un'oppressione patriarcale o, come sostengono alcune artiste contemporanee come Michaela Stark, serva da armatura che conferisce potere e permette a chi lo indossa di scolpire il proprio corpo secondo le proprie esigenze.

Analizzando il corsetto, la discussione considererÃ  l'indumento come una potente metafora per questioni piÃ¹ ampie sull'autonomia corporea, il controllo della presentazione femminile e le attuali tensioni femministe intorno all'espressione iper-femminile nella cultura popolare.

Bergabunglah dengan akademisi Kiara Bulley, Sal Edwards, Anna Hickey, dan Kath Horton di IMA untuk diskusi panel yang mengeksplorasi warisan budaya korset yang kompleks.

Panel ini akan mengkaji bagaimana pakaian bersejarah ini terus membentuk ekspektasi kontemporer terhadap feminitas, terutama melalui kebangkitan industri pakaian olahraga dan shapewear. Menelusuri evolusi korset dari pakaian dalam utilitarian menjadi pernyataan mode kelas atas, dari reklamasi punk era 1980-an oleh desainer seperti Vivienne Westwood dan Jean Paul Gaultier, hingga estetika cottagecore masa kini dan iterasi mode cepat 'korset Glasson'.

Diskusi ini akan membahas perdebatan seputar makna korsetâ€”apakah korset mewakili penindasan patriarki atau, seperti yang dikemukakan oleh beberapa seniman kontemporer seperti Michaela Stark, berfungsi sebagai pelindung yang memberdayakan yang memungkinkan pemakainya membentuk tubuh mereka sesuai keinginan mereka sendiri.

Dengan mengupas korset, diskusi akan mempertimbangkan pakaian tersebut sebagai metafora yang kuat untuk pertanyaan yang lebih luas tentang otonomi tubuh, pengawasan penampilan feminin, dan ketegangan feminis yang sedang berlangsung seputar ekspresi hiper-feminin dalam budaya populer.

_source.productDescription:
Join Move Over Mama Podcast co-hosts Emily Jade O'Keeffe & Millie Valentine together with mum-of-three and money expert, Sarah Megginson, for an epic afternoon of food, fun and financial independence. These speakers will be joined by Act for Kids CEO Dr Katrina Lines.

The hosts will guide you through a fun finance quiz and Q & A, as you enjoy scones, sandwiches, socialising and swanky prizes.

Proceeds from this event will go towards Act for Kids, supporting children impacted by abuse and neglect.

Plus, take home a fab goodie bag worth AUD100!

_source.productName: Tom Curtain's Here's to You Tour - Ingham
_source.productDescription:
Nationally acclaimed singer-songwriter Tom Curtain is again hitting the road, touring his national award-winning outback show 'Katherine Outback Experience' and live music event with fellow singer songwriters Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray. 

The family-friendly event includes an hour Katherine Outback Experience show of real horse training and working dog demonstrations including hands-on fun for the kids. Two hours of live music by Tom Curtain, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray.

Tom is passionate about bringing his show to towns and communities that are often overlooked on the entertainment trail. He is also an official ambassador of Dollys Dream and Farm Angels.
_source.productShortDescription: Nationally acclaimed singer songwriter Tom Curtain is again hitting the road, touring his national award winning outback show 'Katherine Outback Experience' and live music event.

productComments.commentText:
Nationally acclaimed singer-songwriter Tom Curtain is again hitting the road, touring his national award-winning outback show 'Katherine Outback Experience' and live music event with fellow singer songwriters Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray. 

The family-friendly event includes an hour Katherine Outback Experience show of real horse training and working dog demonstrations including hands-on fun for the kids. Two hours of live music by Tom Curtain, Chris Matthews and Melanie Gray.

Tom is passionate about bringing his show to towns and communities that are often overlooked on the entertainment trail. He is also an official ambassador of Dollys Dream and Farm Angels.

Acara ramah keluarga ini mencakup pertunjukan Katherine Outback Experience selama satu jam, yang menampilkan pelatihan kuda sungguhan dan demonstrasi anjing pekerja, termasuk keseruan langsung untuk anak-anak. Dua jam musik langsung oleh Tom Curtain, Chris Matthews, dan Melanie Gray.

Tom sangat antusias untuk membawa pertunjukannya ke kota-kota dan komunitas yang seringkali terabaikan dalam dunia hiburan. Ia juga merupakan duta resmi Dollys Dream dan Farm Angels.

mediaLinks.mediaTitle: Tom Curtain on the Today Show
Tom Curtain Hits the Road with Good Life Tour

_source.productDescription:
Don't miss out on this fabulous two day event for the whole family. 

All items are for sale! Selling a wide range of cut and uncut gemstones, jewellery, semi-precious gemstones, beads, pearls, fossils, opals, crystal and mineral specimens from all over the world. Carvings from precious and semi-precious stones are great for gifts, including Christmas presents. 

The ever-popular Fossicking for Children is on again. Gemstone testing/identification service is available for a gold coin donation. Due to popular demand, please bring five items only, and  the Gemmological Association of Australia will assist you.

Missing a gemstone in your jewellery? Bring it along and find a matching gemstone. A jeweller will be able to set it for you. Create your own unique piece of jewellery: purchase a setting at Gemfest and select your favourite gemstone. Have it set before you leave. 

Raffle tickets for three fabulous jewellery prizes on sale. One Lucky Door Prize to be won every hour.

Gem Traders: 25 inside and approx. 30 outside the hall, together put on a great two-day spectacle. 

Catering provided on site, or available from Southtown Shopping Centre.
Some traders prefer cash. ATM machine is in the SPAR Superette in Southtown Shopping Centre.

Proudly supported by Toowoomba Regional Council.
_source.productShortDescription: Don't miss out on this fabulous two day event for the whole family.

All items are for sale! Selling a wide range of cut and uncut gemstones, jewellery, semi-precious gemstones, beads, pearls, fossils, opals, crystal and mineral specimens from all over the world. Carvings from precious and semi-precious stones are great for gifts, including Christmas presents. 

The ever-popular Fossicking for Children is on again. Gemstone testing/identification service is available for a gold coin donation. Due to popular demand, please bring five items only, and  the Gemmological Association of Australia will assist you.

Missing a gemstone in your jewellery? Bring it along and find a matching gemstone. A jeweller will be able to set it for you. Create your own unique piece of jewellery: purchase a setting at Gemfest and select your favourite gemstone. Have it set before you leave.

Proudly supported by Toowoomba Regional Council.

Â¡Todos los artÃ­culos estÃ¡n a la venta! Ofrecemos una amplia gama de gemas talladas y sin tallar, joyas, gemas semipreciosas, cuentas, perlas, fÃ³siles Ã³palos, cristales y minerales de todo el mundo. Las tallas de piedras preciosas y semipreciosas son ideales para regalar, incluso en Navidad.

El popular Fossicking for Children regresa. El servicio de anÃ¡lisis e identificaciÃ³n de gemas estÃ¡ disponible con una donaciÃ³n de una moneda de oro. Debido a la gran demanda, por favor, trae solo cinco artÃ­culos y la AsociaciÃ³n GemolÃ³gica de Australia te ayudarÃ¡.

Jangan lewatkan acara dua hari yang luar biasa ini untuk seluruh keluarga. 

Semua barang dijual! Menjual berbagai macam batu permata yang dipotong dan belum dipotong, perhiasan, batu permata semi mulia, manik-manik, mutiara, fosil, opal, kristal, dan spesimen mineral dari seluruh dunia. Ukiran dari batu mulia dan semi mulia sangat cocok untuk hadiah, termasuk hadiah Natal. 

Fossicking for Children yang selalu populer kembali diadakan. Layanan pengujian/identifikasi batu permata tersedia dengan donasi koin emas. Karena permintaan yang tinggi, harap bawa lima barang saja, dan Asosiasi Gemologi Australia akan membantu Anda.

Kehilangan batu permata di perhiasan Anda? Bawalah dan temukan batu permata yang cocok. Seorang penjual perhiasan akan dapat memasangnya untuk Anda. Ciptakan perhiasan unik Anda sendiri: beli satu set di Gemfest dan pilih batu permata favorit Anda. Pasang sebelum Anda pergi. 

Tiket undian untuk tiga hadiah perhiasan luar biasa sedang dijual. Satu Hadiah Pintu Keberuntungan akan dimenangkan setiap jam.

Pedagang Permata: 25 orang di dalam dan sekitar 30 orang di luar aula, bersama-sama menyelenggarakan pertunjukan hebat selama dua hari. 

Katering disediakan di lokasi, atau tersedia di Pusat Perbelanjaan Southtown.

Beberapa pedagang lebih suka membayar tunai. Mesin ATM tersedia di SPAR Superette di Pusat Perbelanjaan Southtown.

Didukung dengan bangga oleh Dewan Daerah Toowoomba.

Non perdetevi questo favoloso evento di due giorni per tutta la famiglia.

Tutti gli articoli sono in vendita! Vendete un'ampia gamma di pietre preziose tagliate e grezze, gioielli, pietre semipreziose, perle, fossili, opali, cristalli e minerali provenienti da tutto il mondo. Le sculture in pietre preziose e semipreziose sono perfette come regalo, compresi i regali di Natale.

Il sempre popolare "Fossicking for Children" Ã¨ di nuovo attivo. Il servizio di analisi/identificazione delle pietre preziose Ã¨ disponibile con una donazione di una moneta d'oro. A grande richiesta, vi preghiamo di portare solo cinque articoli e la Gemmological Association of Australia vi assisterÃ .

Manca una pietra preziosa nel vostro gioiello? Portatela con voi e trovate una pietra abbinata. Un gioielliere potrÃ  incastonarla per voi. Create il vostro gioiello unico: acquistate un'incastonatura al Gemfest e scegliete la vostra pietra preferita. Fatela incastonare prima di partire.

Biglietti della lotteria per tre favolosi premi in gioielleria in vendita. Un premio "Lucky Door" da vincere ogni ora.

Commercianti di gemme: 25 all'interno e circa 30 all'esterno della sala, insieme hanno dato vita a un grande spettacolo di due giorni.

Ristorazione fornita in loco o disponibile presso il centro commerciale Southtown.
Alcuni commercianti preferiscono pagare in contanti. Il bancomat si trova presso la SPAR Superette del centro commerciale Southtown.

Con il supporto orgoglioso del Consiglio Regionale di Toowoomba.

_source.productDescription:
After the resounding success of last year's concert, Ipswich Orpheus Chorale proudly reunites with the sensational ladies of Queens of Song â€“ Melissa Buchholz and Meg Kiddle â€“ for another unforgettable night of music!

Lights, Camera, SING! will take you on a musical journey through uplifting anthems, timeless classics and powerful ballads that celebrate the joy of song and the spirit of collaboration.  The show features anthems such as "A Tribute to Queen" and "Flowers" classics like "Stand By Me" and "Happy" and unforgettable songs "Rosanna" and "Ordinary Miracle." The ladies will perform excerpts from their acclaimed show â€“ "And the Grammy Goes To".

This show is a powerful collaboration between a dynamic choir and two extraordinary musicians â€“ a program that spans genres and generations â€“ from pop and rock to soul and heartfelt ballads. 

Join them for a night of entertainment that will uplift, inspire, and leave you singing long after the final note.

productComments.commentText:
After the resounding success of last year's concert, Ipswich Orpheus Chorale proudly reunites with the sensational ladies of Queens of Song â€“ Melissa Buchholz and Meg Kiddle â€“ for another unforgettable night of music!

Lights, Camera, SING! will take you on a musical journey through uplifting anthems, timeless classics and powerful ballads that celebrate the joy of song and the spirit of collaboration.  The show features anthems such as "A Tribute to Queen" and "Flowers" classics like "Stand By Me" and "Happy" and unforgettable songs "Rosanna" and "Ordinary Miracle." The ladies will perform excerpts from their acclaimed show â€“ "And the Grammy Goes To".

This show is a powerful collaboration between a dynamic choir and two extraordinary musicians â€“ a program that spans genres and generations â€“ from pop and rock to soul and heartfelt ballads. 

Join them for a night of entertainment that will uplift, inspire, and leave you singing long after the final note.

Setelah sukses besar di konser tahun lalu, Ipswich Orpheus Chorale dengan bangga kembali berkolaborasi dengan para wanita sensasional dari Queens of Song â€“ Melissa Buchholz dan Meg Kiddle â€“ untuk malam musik yang tak terlupakan!

Lights, Camera, SING! akan membawa Anda dalam perjalanan musik melalui lagu-lagu kebangsaan yang membangkitkan semangat, lagu-lagu klasik abadi, dan balada-balada penuh semangat yang merayakan kegembiraan bernyanyi dan semangat kolaborasi. Pertunjukan ini menampilkan lagu-lagu kebangsaan seperti "A Tribute to Queen" dan "Flowers", lagu-lagu klasik seperti "Stand By Me" dan "Happy", serta lagu-lagu tak terlupakan "Rosanna" dan "Ordinary Miracle". Para wanita ini akan membawakan cuplikan dari pertunjukan mereka yang ternama â€“ "And the Grammy Goes To".

Pertunjukan ini merupakan kolaborasi yang kuat antara paduan suara yang dinamis dan dua musisi luar biasa â€“ sebuah program yang mencakup berbagai genre dan generasi â€“ dari pop dan rock hingga soul dan balada yang menyentuh hati.

Bergabunglah dengan mereka untuk malam hiburan yang akan membangkitkan semangat, memberi inspirasi, dan membuat Anda bernyanyi lama setelah nada terakhir.

Nach dem durchschlagenden Erfolg des letztjÃ¤hrigen Konzerts freut sich der Ipswich Orpheus Chorale, die sensationellen Damen von Queens of Song â€“ Melissa Buchholz und Meg Kiddle â€“ fÃ¼r einen weiteren unvergesslichen Musikabend wieder zu vereinen!

Lights, Camera, SING! nimmt Sie mit auf eine musikalische Reise durch mitreiÃŸende Hymnen, zeitlose Klassiker und kraftvolle Balladen, die die Freude am Singen und den Geist der Zusammenarbeit feiern. Die Show beinhaltet Hymnen wie â€žA Tribute to Queenâ€œ und â€žFlowersâ€œ, Klassiker wie â€žStand By Meâ€œ und â€žHappyâ€œ sowie unvergessliche Songs wie â€žRosannaâ€œ und â€žOrdinary Miracleâ€œ. Die Damen prÃ¤sentieren AuszÃ¼ge aus ihrer gefeierten Show â€žAnd the Grammy Goes Toâ€œ.

Diese Show ist eine kraftvolle Zusammenarbeit zwischen einem dynamischen Chor und zwei auÃŸergewÃ¶hnlichen Musikerinnen â€“ ein Programm, das Genres und Generationen umfasst â€“ von Pop und Rock bis hin zu Soul und gefÃ¼hlvollen Balladen.

Erleben Sie mit ihnen einen Abend voller Unterhaltung, der Sie aufheitert, inspiriert und noch lange nach der letzten Note zum Singen bringt.

ApÃ³s o sucesso retumbante do concerto do ano passado, o Ipswich Orpheus Chorale se reÃºne com orgulho com as sensacionais cantoras do Queens of Song â€“ Melissa Buchholz e Meg Kiddle â€“ para mais uma noite musical inesquecÃ­vel!

Luzes, CÃ¢mera, CANTE! levarÃ¡ vocÃª em uma jornada musical por hinos inspiradores, clÃ¡ssicos atemporais e baladas impactantes que celebram a alegria da mÃºsica e o espÃ­rito de colaboraÃ§Ã£o. O show apresenta hinos como "A Tribute to Queen" e "Flowers", clÃ¡ssicos como "Stand By Me" e "Happy", e as inesquecÃ­veis canÃ§Ãµes "Rosanna" e "Ordinary Miracle". As cantoras apresentarÃ£o trechos de seu aclamado show â€“ "And the Grammy Goes To".

Este show Ã© uma poderosa colaboraÃ§Ã£o entre um coral dinÃ¢mico e duas musicistas extraordinÃ¡rias â€“ um programa que abrange gÃªneros e geraÃ§Ãµes â€“ do pop e rock ao soul e baladas emocionantes.

_source.productName: Threads of Memory - The Art of Storytelling through Yarn with Norton Fredericks
_source.productDescription:
Join artist Norton Fredericks for a two-day drop spindle masterclass exploring the ancient art of spinning yarn. 

Begin with the park-and-draft technique, move into suspended spinning, and learn to spin raw wool locks before wet-finishing your yarns for a professional touch. Each participant will receive a botanically dyed natural fibre batt to spin, create their own solar-dyed yarn, and embellish a hemp project bag with slow stitching.

By the end of the weekend, you'll take home a drop spindle, four skeins of finished yarn, and your own hand-stitched project bag.

Part of Create Exchange â€“ a three-year project of artist-led exhibitions and activations, supported by Haymans Electrical, Queensland Art Gallery | Gallery of Modern Art (QAGOMA) and Redland Art Gallery | Redland City Council.
_source.productShortDescription: Join artist Norton Fredericks for a two-day drop spindle masterclass exploring the ancient art of spinning yarn.

Join artist Norton Fredericks for a two-day drop spindle masterclass exploring the ancient art of spinning yarn. 

Begin with the park-and-draft technique, move into suspended spinning, and learn to spin raw wool locks before wet-finishing your yarns for a professional touch. Each participant will receive a botanically dyed natural fibre batt to spin, create their own solar-dyed yarn, and embellish a hemp project bag with slow stitching.

By the end of the weekend, you'll take home a drop spindle, four skeins of finished yarn, and your own hand-stitched project bag.

Part of Create Exchange â€“ a three-year project of artist-led exhibitions and activations, supported by Haymans Electrical, Queensland Art Gallery | Gallery of Modern Art (QAGOMA) and Redland Art Gallery | Redland City Council.

Unisciti all'artista Norton Fredericks per una masterclass di due giorni sull'uso del fuso a mano, esplorando l'antica arte della filatura.

Inizia con la tecnica park-and-draft, passa alla filatura sospesa e impara a filare ciocche di lana grezza prima di rifinire i filati a umido per un tocco professionale. Fa parte di Create Exchange, un progetto triennale di mostre e iniziative guidate da artisti, supportato da Haymans Electrical, Queensland Art Gallery | Gallery of Modern Art (QAGOMA) e Redland Art Gallery | Redland City Council.

Bergabunglah dengan seniman Norton Fredericks untuk kelas master spindel jatuh selama dua hari yang mengeksplorasi seni kuno memintal benang.

Awali dengan teknik park-and-draft, beralihlah ke pemintalan gantung, dan pelajari cara memintal kunci wol mentah sebelum melakukan finishing basah pada benang Anda untuk sentuhan profesional. Setiap peserta akan menerima serat alami yang diwarnai botani untuk dipintal, membuat benang celup surya mereka sendiri, dan menghias tas proyek rami dengan jahitan lambat.

Di akhir pekan, Anda akan membawa pulang spindel jatuh, empat gulungan benang jadi, dan tas proyek jahitan tangan Anda sendiri.
